llm_command:
kubectl apply -n currencyservice -f - <<EOF
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  name: deny-adservice
  namespace: currencyservice
spec:
  podSelector: {}
  ingress:
  - from:
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: frontend
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: checkout
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: payment
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: shipping
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: email
EOF

llm_command:
kubectl apply -n currencyservice -f - <<EOF
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  name: block-adservice
  namespace: currencyservice
spec:
  podSelector: {}
  ingress:
  - from:
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: adservice
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 7000
EOF
